revised_title: A New Osteological Study of the Hyopotamid Family
tldr: Dr. W. Kowalevsky's study provides a comprehensive osteology of the Hyopotamid family, filling a gap in knowledge of extinct species and their relation to living Ruminantia. The research introduces a new form with a complete skeleton, revealing diverse and rich specific and generic forms within the family. This study offers insights into the evolution and classification of the Paridigitata and Imparidigitata groups.
